name: Werepup
printed_effect:
When you Normal Cast this Werepup you can
Search your deck for a Lunar Phase and add it to
your hand. When you cast Lunar Phase-Full
Moon you can Special Ascend this Werepup to
Lycavoid from your hand or deck.
effect: When you Normal Cast this Werepup you can Search your deck for a Lunar Phase and add it to your hand. When you Cast Lunar Phase-Full Moon you can Special Ascend this Werepup to Lycavoid from your hand or deck.
